org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class ExceptionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.ExceptionInfo

  • public class ExceptionInfo
extends Object
    ExceptionInfo represents an exception-handling annotation in a MethodBodyInfo structure.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExceptionInfo(Label from, Label to, Label target, Name type, Name catchVar)
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExceptionInfo

        public ExceptionInfo(Label from,
             Label to,
             Label target,
             Name type,
             Name catchVar)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        from - - the start of the "try" block.
        to - - the end of the "try" block.
        target - - the "catch" block to transfer to in the event of an exception in the [from, to) region.
        type - - the type of exceptions to handle.
        catchVar - - the name of the catch variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrom

        public Label getFrom()
        Returns:
        the label at the start of the "try" block.

      • getTo

        public Label getTo()
        Returns:
        the label at the end of the "try" block.

      • getTarget

        public Label getTarget()
        Returns:
        the label of the "catch" block.

      • getExceptionType

        public Name getExceptionType()
        Returns:
        the type of exception to be handled.

      • getCatchVar

        public Name getCatchVar()
        Returns:
        the name of the "catch" variable.

      • setLive

        public void setLive(boolean live)
        Reset an ExceptionHandler's live state.
        Parameters:
        live - - the new value for liveness.

      • isLive

        public boolean isLive()
        Is this ExceptionHandler live?
        Returns:
        the ExceptionHandler's live state.
